title: API Request Models
description: REST API request models for all endpoints

CreateTeamRequest.title: Create Team Request
CreateTeamRequest.description: Request to create a new team

JoinTeamRequest.title: Join Team Request
JoinTeamRequest.description: Request to join an existing team

username.description: Username for the player joining the team

team_id.description: ID of the team to join

StartGameRequest.title: Start Game Request
StartGameRequest.description: Request to start a game session

team_id.description: ID of the team starting the game

countdown_duration.description: Countdown duration in seconds before game starts

SubmitAnswerRequest.title: Submit Answer Request
SubmitAnswerRequest.description: Request to submit a puzzle answer

puzzle_id.description: ID of the puzzle being answered

user_id.description: ID of the user submitting the answer

GetCurrentPuzzleRequest.title: Get Current Puzzle Request
GetCurrentPuzzleRequest.description: Request to get the current puzzle for a user

user_id.description: ID of the user to get puzzle for

AssignColorRequest.title: Assign Color Request
AssignColorRequest.description: Request to assign a color to a user

user_id.description: ID of the user to assign color to

UpdatePlayerReadyRequest.title: Update Player Ready Request
UpdatePlayerReadyRequest.description: Request to update player ready status

user_id.description: ID of the user to update

is_ready.description: Whether the player is ready to start

GetGameStateRequest.title: Get Game State Request
GetGameStateRequest.description: Request to get current game state

session_id.description: ID of the completed game session

RestartGameRequest.title: Restart Game Request
RestartGameRequest.description: Request to restart a game session

team_id.description: ID of the team to restart game for
